skills.name: Install Webpack
skills.pattern: npm install webpack webpack-cli webpack-dev-server --save-dev

skills.name: Basic Config
Entry Points
Babel Loader
TypeScript Loader
Style Loaders
Asset Modules
HTML Plugin
CSS Extract
Define Plugin
Code Splitting
Tree Shaking
Minification
Dev Server
Source Maps
skills.pattern:
devtool: 'source-map',  // Production
// devtool: 'eval-source-map',  // Development

skills.name: Path Aliases
Multiple Configs
Build Cache
Module Federation
Bundle Analyzer
skills.pattern:
const BundleAnalyzerPlugin = require('webpack-bundle-analyzer').BundleAnalyzerPlugin;

plugins: [new BundleAnalyzerPlugin()]

skills.name: Dynamic Imports
Externals
Library Output
Build Target
Watch Mode
Performance
Copy Plugin
PostCSS
Dotenv Plugin
skills.pattern:
const Dotenv = require('dotenv-webpack');

plugins: [new Dotenv()]

skills.name: CLI Commands
skills.pattern:
npx webpack
npx webpack --mode=production
npx webpack serve
npx webpack --config webpack.prod.js
